translation: Be shk aashi kvr nạzl yhi qrāni mjyd (yymich dhkr svrh ʿlqs andr chhe) shbi qdrs andr.
Tohyhi kus chyz zạnhi ravh kh shbi qdr kya shb chhu? (be frmavav tamiyuk ḥal th shan)

Shb qdr chh bhtr sash ryth khoth. (yʿny sass ryts ʿbadt krns yvut thvab chhu, tamhi khoth zyadh thvab chhu aath shbs andr ʿbadt krns, ḥẓvr kvr aakhi doh byan kh bny asrạʿyl ạsụ̄ sass ryts ʿbadt kran kyazih timn āsh zychhhi ʿmrh, yhi bvuzith spud ṣḥabh ṣạbn skht afsvs hyv dapnhi lgụ̄ aashi thi he yyicz ʿmr āsihe asụ̄ thi āshv yyicz ʿbadt kran, aaty spud yhi svrh shryf nạzl yath andr Allah tʿālyā hn frmvv kh ae myạnis ḥbyb sndyv aumty yav tohyhi krv aashi ʿṭa shbi qdr yosh sash ryth khoth bhtr chhe. Tath shbs mnz yus ʿbadt kri zan tmụ̄ sash ryth khoth zyadh kals ʿbadt kr.)
Suh chhu tiyuth shb kh nạzl chhi spdan tath shbs mnz mlạyk byyhi rvḥ alqds yʿny jbryli amyn. (zmyns petth pnnis prvrdgar sndi ḥkmh prth qsmch khyr v brkt th slamty hyth.)

Suh khyr v brkt chhunh āsan tamhi shbh kunhi mʿīn ḥṣs andr blkh chhu āsan suh khyr v brkt sạrise shbs ṭlvʿ fjrs tanụ̄. (chnanchh ḥdyth shryfs andr chhu āmut kh jbryli amyn chuh mlạykn hnz aakh bdd jmaʿt sintụ̄ tulith dnyahs andr czopạrụ̄ phyran yas shkhṣs vuchhan chuh mshghvl nemazi sintụ̄ th yadi khdahs sintụ̄ tas chuh duʿāe rḥmt svzan. Byyis rvayts andr chhu ts chuh jbryli amyn slam kran, aamiyuk mʿny thi gvv dʿāe rḥmte, tiy chhu murad slam andrh, amri khyr andrh thi chhu yy murad.)
